Import archive Use this command to open an archive.
Build archive from table Generate a MoleculeArchive using a table with a molecule index column.
Region Difference Calculator Add parameter for difference between two regions.
Add time Retrieve and add time information from metadata.
Drift Calculator Calculate drift in position.
Drift Corrector Remove drift from the molecule positions.
MSD Calculator Add mean squared displacement parameter for molecules.
Merge Archives Merges a set of MoleculeArchives.
Merge Virtual Stores Merges a set of virtual MoleculeArchives.
